turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a drink from Peet's

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can certainly help out with that. Which location would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 5800 Nave Drive

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Novato CA location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Golden Cold Brew Fog Latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are my options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2%, whole, non-fat, almond, soy, and coconut

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Trying to watch my weight. What has the least calories?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The almond has 200 calories for a large

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not super into almonds. What is the next lowest?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: non-fat, soy, and coconut all come  in at 210 calories for a large

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmmm do they offer any other nutritional information?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they do, protein is listed as well

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which one has the most protein?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the non-fat has 7 grams

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets go with that

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay would you like to add any requests for your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are my options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can get sugar free syrups, homemade whipped cream, or chocolate in your drink.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm I'm already going non-fat, lets add some whipped cream for flavor

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so I have a large A Golden Cold Brew Fog Latte with non-fat milk and homemade whipped cream. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It sure is

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be at 5800 Nave Drive Novato CA in about 20 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

items.name: A Golden Cold Brew Fog Latte
